sentences.en: 'I have a chart here,'says Captain Smollett.'see if that's the place.'
sentences.cn: “ 我这里有张图, ”斯摩莱特船长说道, “ 你看看是不是这地方. ”

sentences.en: a chart showing last year’s sales
sentences.cn: 显示去年销售情况的一份图表

sentences.en: a weather chart
sentences.cn: 天气图

sentences.en: As the chart shows, it has failed abysmally.
sentences.cn: 如图表所示，它一败涂地。

sentences.en: Do not draw it on the chart, however, as this will confuse the issue.
sentences.cn: 但不用把它画到图上去，因为那样反而会混淆问题的重点。

sentences.en: Each team was responsible for making its own decisions and charting its own course.
sentences.cn: 每个小组都是自己负责作出决定、制订计划。

sentences.en: Have the nautical chart at your fingertips, and you'll be able to steer your ship.
sentences.cn: 熟水路才能划好船.

sentences.en: his latest chart-topping hit
sentences.cn: 他大受欢迎、占据排行榜首位的新作

sentences.en: Male unemployment was 14.2%, compared with 5.8% for women (see chart on next page).
sentences.cn: 相比女性的5.8%，男性失业率为14.2%（见下页图表）。

sentences.en: Pelham moved across to indicate a wall chart.
sentences.cn: 佩勒姆走过去指着一张挂图。

sentences.en: Scientists have been charting temperature changes in the oceans.
sentences.cn: 科学家们一直在记录海洋温度的变化。

sentences.en: The bar chart below shows the huge growth of UK car exports over the past few years.
sentences.cn: 下面的柱形图显示了过去几年英国汽车出口量的大幅增长。

sentences.en: The book entwines the personal and the political to chart the history of four generations of the family.
sentences.cn: 那本书将个人和政治联系在一起，描述该家族四代人的历史。

sentences.en: The chart can then display the links connecting these groups.
sentences.cn: 这张图就会显示出这些群体之间的关联。

sentences.en: The course of a ship is marked on a chart.
sentences.cn: 轮船的航线是标在航海图上的.

sentences.en: The justification of this chart is entirely spurious.
sentences.cn: 这张图表的依据完全站不住脚。

sentences.en: The kinked line in chart 1 represents this pattern.
sentences.cn: 图表1中的曲线表现了这一模式。

sentences.en: The numbers she put on the chart were 98.4, 64, and 105.
sentences.cn: 她在图表上写的数字是98.4，64和105。

sentences.en: The pupils are all looking at the chart on the wall.
sentences.cn: 学生都瞧着墙上的挂图.

sentences.en: the theatre’s seating chart
sentences.cn: 剧场的座位图

words.tran_cn: 图籍未载的；尚未绘入地图或海图的
宪章派；图解专家；宪章运动者

trans.tran_cn: 图表，海图，(唱片销售量的)排行榜
trans.tran_en: information that is clearly arranged in the form of a simple picture, set of figures,  graph  etc, or a piece of paper with this information on it

trans.tran_cn: 记录，绘制…的地图，制定（计划）
trans.tran_en: to record information about a situation or set of events over a period of time, in order to see how it changes or develops

trans.tran_cn: 用图表表示， 在图上表示
trans.tran_en: if a record charts, it enters the weekly list of the most popular records
